9200.name: Shadow Item - Jester Hat - Firework
9200.description: A festive, shadow-type jester hat with 2 points. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. An event hair accessory that grants a magical effect. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Large Fireworks Ability

9201.name: Shadow Item - Wizard Hat - Firework
9201.description: A shadow-type wizard hat with a wide brim and bent tip. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. An event hair accessory that grants a magical effect. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Large Fireworks Ability

9202.name: Shadow Item - Dapper Cap - Firework
9202.description: A shadow-type hair accessory with a visor. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. An event hair accessory that grants a magical effect. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Large Fireworks Ability

9203.name: Shadow Item - Romantic Chapeau - Firework
9203.description: A shadow-type hair accessory adorned with feathers. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. An event hair accessory that grants a magical effect. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Large Fireworks Ability

9204.name: Shadow Item - Iron Circlet - Firework
9204.description: A shadow-type hair accessory made of iron. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. An event hair accessory that grants a magical effect. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped or sold. Large Fireworks Ability

9205.name: Alchemist's Chest Key
9205.description: A key to open an Alchemist's Chest. For event use only. Chest Key - For Events Only

9206.name: Greater Healing Potion (Event)
9206.description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect lasts for 15 seconds. Designed for use in events only. Greater Healing Potion

9207.name: Quick Healing Potion (Event)
9207.description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect is temporary. Designed for use in events only. Quick Healing Potion

9208.name: Phantom Mask (Event)
9208.description: A scary hair accessory. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. This item is designed for use in events only and cannot be exchanged or dropped.
